channel.title: [Added] Updated URL for the Humanitarian Plan Codelist
channel.description:
Following a request from the IATI community FTS OCHA have confirmed a more user friendly version of the [Humanitarian Plan codelist](https://fts.unocha.org/plan-code-list-iati). This codelist is aligned with the original xml source code. As this change is backwards compatible it will be added to the [Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary](http://reference.iatistandard.org/203/codelists/HumanitarianScopeVocabulary/).
The relevant github pull request is [here](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/262).

item.title: [Added] Updated URL for the Humanitarian Plan Codelist
item.dc:creator: Michelle_IOM
item.description:
Dear Amy & Team,

Thanks a million. As much as I’m slowly learning to look at XML data, it is always preferable to have a more “user friendly” way of reading the lists.

Kind Regards,
Michelle

Read full topic
item.source: [Added] Updated URL for the Humanitarian Plan Codelist
